import React, { Component } from "react"; import { NavLink, Link, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; export class Header extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { menus: [ { pageName: "Home", path: "/", isActive: false }, { pageName: "Login", path: "/login", isActive: false }, { pageName: "Logout", path: "/logout", isActive: false }, ], login: localStorage.getItem("token") ? true : false, }; this.logout = this.logout.bind(this); this.activeMenu = this.activeMenu.bind(this); } logout() { localStorage.removeItem("token"); this.setState({ login: false }); } activeMenu(match, location) { if (!match) { return false; } else if (match && match.url) { let menus = this.state.menus.map((obj) => obj.path == match.url ? obj.isActive : true ); this.setState({ menus: menus, }); return true; } } render() { return (
    {this.state.menus.map((obj, index) => (
  • {obj.pageName}
    • ))}

); } } export default Header;
